message.body: Vermont this weekend?
Are you coming? I thought you said you couldn't. OMG did I mess up?
No no you didn't mess up. I'm not coming. Just asking if your prepared.
Oh! Omg I almost had a heart attack.
I'm sorry!! No!I want to come so bad though.
Oh lord. I was texting Charles and telling him I messed up and that he has to drive hahaha but yes. I'm all ready.
No mess up. I should have asked better. I'm glad your ready. What's the plan?
We got a rental. Picking that up at 5 tomorrow morning and then we'll be on our way. I wish you were coming :(
Wow that's so early. I know it's been on my bucket list for so long, we will just have to go again together. This is you're test run :) how many people ended up going
6. Possibly 7. One person can't figure out their life lol
Oh lord well they better figure it out, it's tomorrow
I know haha something's going on in his family I think. So one day it's "yeah I coming" and then the next it's "no, can't go" and today it's "maybe I can go after all" lol whatever
Hmm I see that sucks but it's a little annoying too haha.
Yeah lol seriously
How's the trip going
It's long lol still driving
is it a pretty ride at least
Oh man that makes it harder. Are they switching driving?
Eh not really lol
Yeah. We're on the 3rd driver now
Haha teamwork makes the dream work how many more hours you think you have left
Maybe about an hour and half to two hours. But they wanna stop at a brewery on the way lol so who knows what time we'll get there
Oh fun! That's sounds cool. I hope you have a blast but not too much, save some for when I come :) stay warm!
Lol I will!
